enb_long_title: Twelfth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) Working Group III (WGIII-12) and Thirty-ninth Session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-39)
section_title: REPORT ON THE ACTIVITIES OF THE IPCC EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE
sentences: Chair Pachauri reported on the activities of the Executive Committee since IPCC-37, noting the smooth work of the committee through regular electronic meetings.
